;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** ;* ;* NAME: ;* ROUJEAN_BRDF_KERNEL_F2 ;* ;* PURPOSE: ;* RETURNS THE 2ND ROUJEAN BRDF COEFICIENT ;* ;* CALLING SEQUENCE: ;* RES = ROUJEAN_BRDF_KERNEL_F2(K2_SZA,K2_VZA,K2_RAA) ;* ;* INPUTS: ;* K2_SZA - A SCALAR OR ARRAY OF SOLAR ZENITH VALUES IN RADIANS FOR COMPUTATION ;* K2_VZA - A SCALAR OR ARRAY OF VIEWING ZENITH VALUES IN RADIANS FOR COMPUTATION ;* K2_RAA - A SCALAR OR ARRAY OF RELATIVE AZIMUTH VALUES IN RADIANS FOR COMPUTATION ;* ;* KEYWORDS: ;* DEGREES - SET TO INDICATE INPUT ANGLES ARE DEGREES AND NOT RADIANS AS EXPECTED ;* VERBOSE - PROCESSING STATUS OUTPUTS ;* ;* OUTPUTS: ;* KERNEL_F2 - A FLOAT OF 2ND ROUJEAN COEFICIENT ;* ;* COMMON BLOCKS: ;* NONE ;* ;* MODIFICATION HISTORY: ;* 22 MAR 2007 - M BOUVET - PROTOTYPE DIMITRI VERSION ;* 24 JAN 2011 - C KENT - DIMITRI-2 V1.0 ;* ;* VALIDATION HISTORY: ;* 14 APR 2011 - C KENT - WINDOWS 32-BIT IDL 7.1 AND LINUX 64-BIT IDL 8.0 NOMINAL ;* COMPILATION AND OPERATION. TESTED ON MERIS 2ND REPROCESSING ;* WITH MERIS 3RD REPROCESSING AND MODISA COLLECTION 5 ;* ;************************************************************************************** ;************************************************************************************** FUNCTION ROUJEAN_BRDF_KERNEL_F2,K2_SZA,K2_VZA,K2_RAA,DEGREES=DEGREES,VERBOSE=VERBOSE IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT,'ROUJEAN_BRDF_KERNEL_F2: STARTING ROUJEAN COMPUTATION' ;----------------------------------------- ; TURN INPUT ANGLES INTO RADIANS IF NEEDED IF KEYWORD_SET(DEGREES) THEN BEGIN IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT,'ROUJEAN_BRDF_KERNEL_F2: DEGREES KEYWORD SET' SZA_RD = K2_SZA*!DTOR VZA_RD = K2_VZA*!DTOR TEMP = WHERE(ABS(K2_RAA) GT 180.0) IF TEMP[0] GT -1 THEN K2_RAA[TEMP] = 360.0-K2_RAA[TEMP] RAA_RD = K2_RAA*!DTOR ENDIF ELSE BEGIN SZA_RD = K2_SZA VZA_RD = K2_VZA TEMP = WHERE(ABS(K2_RAA) GT 2*(!DPI)) IF TEMP[0] GT -1 THEN K2_RAA[TEMP] = 2*(!DPI)-K2_RAA[TEMP] RAA_RD = K2_RAA ENDELSE ;----------------------------------------- ; COMPUTE THE ROUJEAN KERNEL F2 VALUE SCATT_ANGLE_RD = ACOS(COS(SZA_RD)*COS(VZA_RD)+SIN(SZA_RD)*SIN(VZA_RD)*COS(RAA_RD)) KERNEL_F2 = 4./3./!DPI/(COS(SZA_RD)+COS(VZA_RD)) KERNEL_F2 = KERNEL_F2*((!DPI/2.-SCATT_ANGLE_RD)*COS(SCATT_ANGLE_RD)+SIN(SCATT_ANGLE_RD)) KERNEL_F2 = KERNEL_F2-1./3. ;----------------------------------------- ;RETURN THE KERNEL VALUE IF KEYWORD_SET(VERBOSE) THEN PRINT,'ROUJEAN_BRDF_KERNEL_F2: RETURNING THE ROUJEAN F2 VALUE' RETURN, KERNEL_F2 END
